name: Webiots Team Showcase and slider
author: Webiots

sections.description:
Fully compatible with the brand new WordPress v4.8 and Visual Composer!
Check out live demo.
Grid or Carousel or Grid Filter
Rich Snippets/Structured Data compatible
Visual Composer Compatible

=Features=
* Predefined style presets for each layout
* Social icons: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn
* Unlimited Team Members
* Multisite compatible.

Plugin Develop by Webiots Visit website

We provide advance level of support for installation and customization at hourly rates.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for \”webiots teamshowcase\”.
  3. Click \”Install Now\”.

OR

  1. Download the zip file.
  2. Upload the zip file via Plugins > Add New > Upload.

Activate the plugin. Look for \”Team Showcase\” in the admin menu.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for \”webiots teamshowcase\”.
  3. Click \”Install Now\”.

OR

  1. Download the zip file.
  2. Upload the zip file via Plugins > Add New > Upload.

Activate the plugin. Look for \”Team Showcase\” in the admin menu.

What are the shortcodes?

[webiots-team] – To display your team showcase as a list or a grid or video. There are no complicated shortcode options.

[webiots-team] => default layout
[webiots-team style=\"gridfilter\"]
[webiots-team style=\"grid\"]
[webiots-team style=\"carousel\"]

Yes. The plugin supports the WordPress embed feature for inserting team showcase from these sources.

short_description: Easily add and display your employees, team members in Grid view and Slider view in any pages. Best Responsive Team Showcase Wordpress plugin.
